primary.context: Customer received a letter about the new portal and is struggling with the ID and registration process.
primary.detail: The agent was in the process of confirming the email address to send a registration link when the call ended.

secondary.context: Customer confused RCI ID with Vacatia ID during registration.
secondary.detail: Agent clarified that the RCI ID is not the same as the Vacatia ID and explained the registration requirement.

steps: Customer explained difficulty registering for the new Vacatia Clubhouse portal.
Agent initiated account lookup and identity verification.
Agent clarified the difference between RCI ID and Vacatia ID.
Agent offered to send a new registration link.
Agent confirmed the email address on file before the call disconnected.

clarifications.note: Agent asked for last name spelling again.

corrections.note: Customer corrected spelling of last name (Akerman).

actions.detail: Verified name and state of residence.
Call ended during email confirmation step.

insights.summary: The customer was frustrated with the new portal registration process and confused about which ID to use. The agent successfully verified the account and was about to send a registration link when the call disconnected.
insights.verbatim: I type in the code that I got from the code, and it says it's not no good... I'm just trying to set this thing up. It's ridiculous.
insights.coaching: The agent handled the technical confusion well, but could have been faster in the initial verification phase to reach the resolution before the disconnect.
